options.name: Check Folio Exists
options.description: Check if the folio exists

options.name: Count Folios
options.description: Returns number of folios

options.name: Create Folio
options.description: Create additional folios for a reservation, or new external folios

options.name: Get Folio
options.description: Returns one folio

options.name: List Folios
options.description: Returns a list of all folios

options.name: Update Folio
options.description: Allows to modify certain properties of a folio

options.name: Bulk Move Charges
options.description: Move multiple charges from one folio to another. Multiple source folios and multiple target folios can be specified.

options.name: Close Folio
options.description: Closes a folio

options.name: Correct Folio
options.description: Corrects a folio by moving some charges. This operation creates a new folio with the charges from the request. The payment, equal to the sum of charges, is also split to this new folio so that both folios will have 0 balance.

options.name: Create Bulk Allowances
options.description: Posts allowances for a folio

options.name: Create Charge Allowance
options.description: Posts an allowance for a charge

options.name: Create Folio Allowance
options.description: Posts an allowance for a folio

options.name: Create Folio Cancellation Fee
options.description: Adds and directly posts a cancellation fee to the folio. If there are any fees configured for the property, an additional charge for each configured fee will be added. If a routing instruction is defined for the cancellation fee service type, the fee will be moved to the destination folio.

options.name: Create Folio Charge
options.description: Adds and directly posts a charge to the folio. If there are any fees configured for the property, an additional charge for each configured fee will be added.

options.name: Create Folio No Show Fee
options.description: Adds and directly posts a no-show fee to the folio. If there are any fees configured for the property, an additional charge for each configured fee will be added. If a routing instruction is defined for the no-show fee service type, the fee will be moved to the destination folio.

options.name: Create Folio Transitory Charge
options.description: Adds and directly posts a transitory charge to the folio. If there are any fees configured for the property, an additional charge for each configured fee will be added.

options.name: Move All Folio Charges
options.description: Move all charges and transitory charges from one folio to another

options.name: Move Folio Charges
options.description: Move multiple charges, allowances and transitory charges from one folio to another

options.name: Move Folio Payments
options.description: Move multiple payments from one guest/booking folio to another

options.name: Post Folio Charges
options.description: Posts all unposted charges for the whole length of stay

options.name: Reopen Folio
options.description: Reopens a folio

options.name: Split Folio Charge
options.description: Splits a charge into two using the percent or amount provided Creates an allowance and two new charges

options.name: Split Folio Payment
options.description: Splits a payment into two using the percent or amount provided Creates a refund and two new payments

options.name: Cancel Payment
options.description: Cancels a pending payment link

options.name: Create Account Payment
options.description: Trigger a payment using the payment account stored on the reservation

options.name: Create Auth Payment
options.description: Captures a specific amount from a pre-authorization and posts it to the folio

options.name: Create Folio Payment
options.description: Trigger a custom payment for the folio

options.name: Create Folio Refund
options.description: Trigger a refund for the folio

options.name: Create Payment Link
options.description: Creates a link to a payment form where guests can pay

options.name: Create Payment Refund
options.description: Trigger a refund for a specific payment

options.name: Create Terminal Payment
options.description: Trigger a payment on a card terminal for the folio
